mapper.update: update app_ap_vendor_detail set ap_vendor_detail_id = #{apVendorDetailId}, vendor_id = #{vendorId}, date = #{date}, note = #{note}, debit = #{debit}, credit = #{credit}, debit_balance = #{debitBalance}, credit_balance = #{creditBalance}, balance = #{balance}, reference_no = #{referenceNo}, ar_due_date = #{arDueDate}, status = #{status} where ap_vendor_detail_id = #{apVendorDetailId};
